name: The Paper Boat (codekatrin)
description:
The Paper Ship
A peaceful drive on a planet of ocean.
And for one the entire planet is just a room.

Controls:
Click LMB to add force to the paper ship. And stop clicking to slow down and avoid whales.
But you don't want to slow down too much, because then the ship will sink into the ocean.

Credits:
Katrin - art, game-design, sounds (email: kachalkova.ekaterina@gmail.com)
Kirill Losev - code, game-design (@kirlosev on twitter/instagram)

For Ludum Dare 37.
